explanation:
code_hardening: Added null checks for Context and key, initialized the return value to the caller-supplied default def, and ensured safe fallback to def in all non-fatal cases.
resolve_compilation_errors: Updated the method signature to include the String def parameter, switched reflective lookup to the two-argument SystemProperties.get(String, String), and aligned parameter type arrays and invocation arguments accordingly using fully qualified Method where needed.
exception_handling: Preserved propagation of IllegalArgumentException unchanged, while catching all other exceptions and returning def without introducing new checked exceptions.
logic_customization: Replaced the one-argument reflective call with the two-argument version passing (key, def), and changed fallback behavior so missing keys or errors yield def rather than an empty string.
refactoring: Changed method visibility from public to private, updated Javadoc to document the new default-return behavior and parameter, and renamed the local variable from ret to result for clarity.
misc: Minor comment and formatting updates consistent with the new method contract; no new custom API calls were introduced.
